markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Grimspawn](/Feats.aspx?ID=1380) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 40 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your lineage traces back to a [daemon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=26), one of the manifestations of horrific forms of death that devour souls within their foul home of [Abaddon](/Planes.aspx?ID=12). As a result, you cling tenaciously to the last shreds of your own life force. You gain the [Diehard](/Feats.aspx?ID=774) feat.

<title level="2">Grimspawn leads to...</title>
[Daemon Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1387)
name: Grimspawn
